    Job Board

        Uses a cron service worker that updates every 30 seconds to fetch posted jobs on github. Proceeds to filter the fetched results looking for keyword such as manager, sr. architect, etc. Then stores the sorted data in a redis client, which is then served to the website. Built utilizing: React, Express.js, Redis, Node.js, Cron
